author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam tours through the Paramount Pictures film archives, where Executive Director Chuck Woodfill shows us the many types of media inventoried and preserved for digitalization and restoration. 

Thanks to the Paramount Pictures Archives team for hosting us at their archives!

Tested Team Youtube Channel  @TestedTeam   ASC Video Series:
The History of Hollywood Film Cameras and Cinematography: https://youtu.be/SPOLxZfVB-o
The History of Hollywood's Large Format Film Cameras!: https://youtu.be/uRg_qjXMZjE
Adam Savage Learns About VistaVision Filming Cameras at Paramount: https://youtu.be/YX9eV_JeVR0
The Weird History of Archival Film Formats: https://youtu.be/YY8r8jOOIVg

Shot by Joey Fameli and edited by Josh Self
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Inside The Paramount Film Archives!
